articles.author: Wageningen University
articles.title: Five-year study suggests chimpanzees strike stones against trees as form of communication - Phys.org
articles.description: A recent study by behavioral biologists from Wageningen University & Research and the German Primate Research Center has uncovered a remarkable phenomenon among wild chimpanzees in West Africa: the use of stones to produce sound, presumably as a form of commu…
